articles.description: Emerging evidence suggests that COVID-19 may actually trigger the onset of diabetes in healthy people and also cause severe complications of pre-existing diabetes.
articles.content:
Emerging evidence suggests that COVID-19 may actually trigger the onset of diabetes in healthy people and also cause severe complications of pre-existing diabetes.

articles.title: Ask Amy: When I said he could have sex with other people, I didn’t expect this - The Mercury News
articles.description: He won’t give me the specifics of his hookups, but I have my suspicions.
articles.content:
DEAR AMY: I’m gay and in a long-distance relationship with my partner/boyfriend. I live in a city on the East Coast and he lives in a city on the West Coast.
